messages.title: Building a stronger economy and fairer society in Portsmouth
messages.content: Gerald Vernon-Jackson and the Liberal Democrats will balance the budget by 2018, create jobs, and bring back control of our borders. Portsmouth has a proud maritime history and the Liberal Democrats have a proven track record of standing up for local people.

messages.title: Our record of delivery
messages.content: An £800 Income Tax cut for ordinary local workers, halved the deficit and helped businesses create 1.9 million new jobs, created 7,720 new apprenticeships in Portsmouth for young people

messages.title: Our promise of more
messages.content: Cut Income Tax by an additional £400 for low and middle income workers, balance the budget by 2018, to bring down Britain’s debt, create a Jobs Hub in Portsmouth to help people find work and improve their skills

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Balance the budget by 2018, create jobs, and bring back control of our borders.
An £800 Income Tax cut for ordinary local workers and plan to cut Income Tax by an additional £400 for low and middle-income workers.

Helped businesses create 1.9 million new jobs, created 7,720 new apprenticeships in Portsmouth for young people, and aims to create a Jobs Hub in Portsmouth to help people find work and improve their skills.
Halved the deficit and aims to balance the budget by 2018, to bring down Britain’s debt.

issues.economy: Balance the budget by 2018, create jobs, and bring back control of our borders.

leaflet.personalStatement: "I’m backing Gerald Vernon-Jackson to deliver even more for Portsmouth. Having worked with both Gerald and the Conservative candidate, the difference between them could not be starker."

endorsements.endorser: Endorsement from a person with quote
endorsements.endorsement: Gerald has over a decade’s experience getting the job done for local people. The decision for me couldn’t be easier - Gerald will have my vote in May.

quotes.text: The decision for me couldn’t be easier - Gerald will have my vote in May.
